message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm asking for $20,000 to start negotiations. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $15,000. Could you do $18,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I appreciate your response, Alice. I'm still not able to meet at $18,000. Would you consider $16,000?
